item.title: Meet the Winemakers - Seven Birches Winery Tour
item.description: Whether you’re a wine lover or just going along with others who are passionate about the drink, you won’t want to miss this White Mountains Seven Birches Winery Tour that takes you intimately through the wine-making process with the wine makers themselves. Enjoy tastings of both young and old wines, as well as a full-on tour of the winery’s wine production room.

image.alt: Meet the Winemakers - Seven Birches Winery Tour

item.title: Public | Small Group Islands & Harbor Sightseeing Tour | 2-2.5hr
item.description: Discover the landscapes of New Hampshire's coast on a small-group bike tour. Visit New Castle, see the Isle of Shoals, ride across the Piscataqua River, and get views of the Atlantic Ocean. Explore the best of Portsmouth and New Castle while stopping en route to hear some interesting history and a bit of story-telling.

image.alt: Public | Small Group Islands & Harbor Sightseeing Tour | 2-2.5hr

item.title: WW2 Small Arms Experience
item.description:
You have seen these iconic weapons used in countless movies and video games. This is a unique opportunity to not only see them up close and learn about them, but also to handle them and test your skill by firing them at a target.
This is the only program of it's kind in the northeast.

image.alt: WW2 Small Arms Experience

item.title: Kancamagus Scenic Byway Self-Guided Audio Driving Tour Guide
item.description: Explore the beauty of the scenic Kancamagus Highway in the White Mountains with help from this self-guided audio driving tour from Woodstock or Conway. Enjoy the flexibility to travel at your own pace, hands-free functionality, and offline access, so you can use the app even in remote areas, too. Includes full itineraries, travel tips, audio guide, videos, and text.

image.alt: Kancamagus Scenic Byway Self-Guided Audio Driving Tour Guide

item.title: Self Guided Haunted Walking Tour in Portsmouth APP/GPS/EMF Reader
item.description: Uncover the sordid history of Portsmouth, New Hampshire as you embark on a self-guided walking tour through the city’s haunted locations. The GPS activates each audio description as you walk past it and informs you of the spooky history of each location. See important landmarks like the Old Red Light District and the African Burial Grounds and listen to spooky tales of ghosts, witches, and murderers.

image.alt: Self Guided Haunted Walking Tour in Portsmouth APP/GPS/EMF Reader

item.title: Colonial Flintlock Musket Experience
item.description: Experience colonial history first-hand on this small-group colonial flintlock musket experience. Learn about colonial firearms technology from a professional historic locksmith. After a safety briefing and instruction on use, fire a replica historic flintlock musket at a rustic shooting range. All equipment and safety gear provided for a hassle-free experience.

image.alt: Colonial Flintlock Musket Experience

item.title: Superman Zipline Tour in Morningside
item.description: Zipline through lush treetops for an immersive experience of New Hampshire’s forest world on this zipline tour in Morningside Flight Park. Enjoy dramatic views of the Connecticut River Valley as you complete a course of seven zip lines and two suspension bridges. This thrilling activity is a fun option for families with kids who meet the weight minimum of 100 pounds.

image.alt: Superman Zipline Tour in Morningside

item.title: Self-Guided Portsmouth Scavenger Hunt: Pretty Portsmouth
item.description: Discover the art, culture, and history of Portsmouth, from top landmarks like Market Square and Prescott Park to hidden gems, on this fun scavenger hunt. Download the app, gather your team, choose your roles, and head out to uncover clues, answer trivia questions, and solve challenges, all while learning about Portsmouth in a fun and memorable way.

image.alt: Self-Guided Portsmouth Scavenger Hunt: Pretty Portsmouth

item.title: Public | Rental-21-Speed Bike Portsmouth NH | 3-hrs
item.description: Explore Portsmouth, New Hampshire on two wheels with this half-day, self-guided bike tour. Choose your own pace and cycle between landmarks at your leisure. See local sites like Prescott Park, Fort Stark State Historic Site, and the Wentworth-Gardner House. Plan your own itinerary and cover ground quickly on a comfortable hybrid bicycle. This rental includes a map, lock, and helmet.

image.alt: Public | Rental-21-Speed Bike Portsmouth NH | 3-hrs

item.title: Oyster Tasting and Kayak Tour
item.description:
This two-hour tour is the perfect opportunity for those looking to taste fresh oysters, paddle with a trained kayak guide, and observe coastal wildlife.
We will explore Little Bay, a tidal estuary located outside of Portsmouth, NH, near the mouth of the Piscataqua River where there is an abundance of aquatic wildlife from shellfish to shorebirds. Then, we will paddle to Hidden Coast Shellfish's floating farmhouse to learn all about their growing and harvesting process. The oysters you sample will be fresh picked from the ocean!

image.alt: Oyster Tasting and Kayak Tour

item.title: Tea Blending
item.description: Spend a few hours learning how to craft the perfect blend of tea with a clinical herbalist at one of Portsmouth, New Hampshire’s tea and apothecary shops. There are 250 different herbs in the shop, and you can learn all about the benefits they bring to the body, and the art of blending them together to create a unique tea.

image.alt: Tea Blending

item.title: Explore the Area | Private & Custom Group Bike Tours | 2-2.5 hrs.
item.description: Get more out of your group’s time in Portsmouth with this private bike tour. Covering far more ground than you would on foot, your guide will lead your pedal party to Prescott Park, Great Island Common, and beyond, highlighting everything you need to know along the way. Your guide can also customize your trip, guaranteeing a personalized Portsmouth adventure.

image.alt: Explore the Area | Private & Custom Group Bike Tours | 2-2.5 hrs.

item.title: Public | Small Group Historic Neighborhoods Bike Tour | 1.5-2hr
item.description:
Our neighborhoods are a treasure trove of fascinating history and culture. From the 18th and 19th century buildings, preserved architecture, riverfront parks, and sculptures, you will hear stories of each of the neighborhood's rich and complex stories. You will discover the charming neighborhoods and districts by bicycle. Your friendly guide will take you through the city's five distinctive boroughs, stopping at historical landmarks and points of interest throughout the tour. Save direct
Uniquely see the city while learning about its fascinating history and well-preserved 18th -19th-century architecture. We guarantee this tour to be a fun and informative experience while getting to know Portsmouth and the state motto we live by since the American Revolution; "Live Free Or Die.​
Meet 30 minutes prior to your departure time to get fitted with your bike. You’ll hear a short briefing about the rules of the road, bike safety, and bike operation. Children and families are most welcome!

image.alt: Public | Small Group Historic Neighborhoods Bike Tour | 1.5-2hr

item.title: Self-Guided Audio Driving Tour in Kancamagus Highway
item.description:
Download the GuideAlong self-guided audio tour and you'll discover more on your Kancamagus Highway road trip. Hear fascinating behind-the-scenes stories, local tips and directions play automatically, all based on your location.
You'll be guided to all of the area's famous highlights as well as lessor known gems including one of New Hampshire's most photographed bridges, a stunning overlook with scenic views for miles, a beautiful riverside picnic spot and a powerful, narrow gorge with a rushing waterfall.
Enjoy the freedom to explore offline at your own pace, spending more time at places that interest you, and bypass any that don’t.
✅ Stories, tips and directions play automatically based on your location ✅ Travel at your own pace ✅ Tour offline using GPS, no cell service or WiFi needed ✅ Suggested itineraries for half, full or multi day use ✅ No time limits or expiry, free updates ✅ Like having a tour guide along for the drive
Purchase one tour per vehicle.

image.alt: Self-Guided Audio Driving Tour in Kancamagus Highway

item.title: Kancamagus highway GPS Smartphone Audio Driving Tour App
item.description: This driving tour will take you through the Kamcamagus highway and it’s most famous attractions and hidden gems. It is location aware tour and plays as you drive. When you reach a spot of interest the stories play. You’ll see the famous sites, bridges, overlooks, swimming holes and photo perfect spots. You’ll also discover the story of the land, the native people, the settlers that came here and the stories and legends associated to the lands. The tour never expires, go anytime.

image.alt: Kancamagus highway GPS Smartphone Audio Driving Tour App

item.title: Self-Guided Walking Tour of Benson Park, Hudson, NH
item.description: Explore New Hampshire’s Benson Park with the voice of its original founder in your ear on this smartphone-based self-guided walking tour. Opened in 1924 as Benson’s Wild Animal Farm, this park was once home to a cast of exotic creatures, along with wild entertainment options. The park may have taken on a more conventional demeanor in recent years, but this audio tour lets you hear about the park’s madcap early days from John T. Benson himself.

image.alt: Self-Guided Walking Tour of Benson Park, Hudson, NH

item.title: Public| Small Group Nature Adventure Tour NH Rail Trail | 2-2.5hr
item.description:
A new tour with the expanded rail from Portsmouth to North Hampton. Immerse yourself in the natural surroundings of Portsmouth New Hampshire. On this Fall nature bike tour, you will take in the quiet and calmness of nature! You can’t help but relax and unwind. Do you love the outdoors and the peacefulness of the trees rustling and the sound of nature? This Nature Adventure Gravel Tour is the perfect way to experience the quietness of the outdoors while getting in some fresh air, and exercise. Save direct
Pedal through lush open wooded areas and next to fields while taking in the flora and fauna. On this tour, you will ride freely and enjoy the open air while taking in the scenery, and peacefulness!
Meet your guide 30 minutes before your departure time to get fitted with your bike. You’ll hear about the rules of the road, bike safety, and bike operation.
Highlights: Flora and fauna Flat trail riding on crushed stone Beautiful marshes Colorful Foliage Wildlife
E-bikes on our site.

image.alt: Public| Small Group Nature Adventure Tour NH Rail Trail | 2-2.5hr

item.title: Lake Tarleton Guided Paddle
item.description:
After meeting at the public boat launch, you'll enjoy a leisurely day paddling around on Lake Tarleton, with views of the majestic White Mountains in the background. Mt. Moosilauke, on of the famous 4000-footers of the White Mountains, features prominently on the horizon.
Our experienced guides, each of whom are local experts and avid outdoorsmen, are also certified in the principles of "Leave No Trace," a wilderness philosophy aimed at protecting the world's most beautiful places from damage due to improper and irresponsible use. Ask them about the natural and human history of the region, and they'll be happy to tell you some stories.

image.alt: Lake Tarleton Guided Paddle

item.title: Pedal, Paddle & Hike New Hampshire
item.description:
This incredible weekend of adventure takes you to many of New Hampshire’s most beautiful and iconic areas. You’ll explore gorgeous Franconia Notch by bike & boot, kayak the beautiful Pemigewasset River, and cycle the fabulous Northern Rail Trail.
We’ll also pamper you with an outstanding “glamping” experience, where you can relax and enjoy the peace and tranquility of the beautiful mountain surroundings.

image.alt: Pedal, Paddle & Hike New Hampshire

item.title: 100+ Self Guided Driving & Walking Tours by Action
item.description: Enjoy over 100 self-guided driving and walking tours across the USA. Each tour is professionally narrated to provide context, uncover hidden gems, and explain historic events. Discover the happening streets of Brooklyn, and experience the wildlife of Yellowstone. Ranging from historic battlefields to national parks, the tour automatically begins when triggered by GPS, no signal or WiFi needed. The bundle is valid for one year after purchase.

image.alt: 100+ Self Guided Driving & Walking Tours by Action

Book your Private Departure Transfer from Manchester hotel or any address to Manchester–Boston Regional Airport (MHT).
Don't go through all the hassle of waiting in a long taxi or shared shuttles queues and use our private, door to door airport transfer.
Your driver will be waiting for you at a scheduled time and you will travel comfortably to your destination.
• Meeting with a Nameplate • We track your Flight • Door-to-door Service • No Hidden Charges • Clean cars & Professional drivers

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Manchester by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: Zombie Scavengers in Manchester challenges your team to survive a zombie apocalypse! The game instructs you to find a variety of items to survive the apocalypse anywhere in the city you'd like via an app. Get points for finding survival items (in any order you want) and participating in exciting zombie themed tasks. Plan your survival adventure carefully in order to get the most points to survive! A remote host will be following along (virtually) and help if you need it via chat. Come survive with us in Manchester today!

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Manchester by Zombie Scavengers
